column4: can anyone recommend some free software with articles and forum?
So, like a forum and wiki in one?
I looked at that, and it seems to be a custom site, I reckon
Their forum is vBulletin. Which seems to be inside an i-frame on their site
well phpBB would be ok as forum
but i need something for articles
Definitely phpBB for your forum - it rules. And you could try something like wordpress for articles.
i want something to write FAQ's
i could go code php myself, but i'm looking if there's something tested
You want a wiki system then.
i want it more linear than wiki
My suggestion would be to write it yourself then. I honestly don't know any systems out there like that. And I write all my own stuff on websites. Apart from forums (Sod that), for which I use phpBB
